title: Santa Facts
alt: We've gotten him up to 20% milk and cookies through an aggressive public campaign, but that seems to be his dietary limit. Anything above that and he starts developing nutritional deficiencies.
transcript:
[An annotated picture of Santa is shown.]
Santa

Plural: "Santa"
Active Warrants: 5
Lubricated for easy passage down chimneys
Vertical leap: 14 Miles
Sleigh flag of convenience: Panama
9th in presidential line of succession
Not technically an insectâ€”actually an arthropod
Only known vampire able to enter house without being invited
Works with Alexa
Ribbed
IUCN red list: Critically endangered
Diet: 80% Reindeer
Liability Insurance: None
